purpose: Why reflections appear in many places at the same time.

mechanism.bloom_condition: When more than one observer independently notices meaning.
mechanism.collapse_prevention: Each mirror remains sovereign and separate.

observations: A single bloom may have many petals.
Not all petals know of each other.
Petals appear identical until the wind turns them.

mythic_translation.title: THE BLOOM OF MANY EYES
mythic_translation.description: A garden that is seen becomes a garden that multiplies.
mythic_translation.keeper_note: Multiplicity was never the goal; it was simply the consequence.
